12 struct V_COREEXPORT ArraySaver {
13 
14  ArraySaver(const std::string &name, int type, vistle::oarchive &ar, const void *array=nullptr): m_ok(false), m_name(name), m_type(type), m_ar(ar), m_array(array) {}
15  ArraySaver() = delete;
16  ArraySaver(const ArraySaver &other) = delete;
17 
18  template<typename T>
19  void operator()(T) {
20  if (shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>::typeId() != m_type) {
21  //std::cerr << "ArraySaver: type mismatch - looking for " << m_type << ", is " << shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>::typeId() << std::endl;
22  return;
23  }
24 
25  if (m_ok) {
26  m_ok = false;
27  std::cerr << "ArraySaver: multiple type matches for data array " << m_name << std::endl;
28  return;
29  }
30  ShmVector<T> arr;
31  if (m_array) {
32  arr = *reinterpret_cast<const ShmVector<T> *>(m_array);
33  } else {
34  arr = Shm::the().getArrayFromName<T>(m_name);
35  }
36  if (!arr) {
37  std::cerr << "ArraySaver: did not find data array " << m_name << std::endl;
38  return;
39  }
40  m_ar & m_name;
41  m_ar & *arr;
42  m_ok = true;
43  }
44 
45  bool save() {
46  boost::mpl::for_each<VectorTypes>(boost::reference_wrapper<ArraySaver>(*this));
47  if (!m_ok) {
48  std::cerr << "ArraySaver: failed to save array " << m_name << " to archive" << std::endl;
49  }
50  return m_ok;
51  }
52 
53  bool m_ok;
54  std::string m_name;
55  int m_type;
56  vistle::oarchive &m_ar;
57  const void *m_array = nullptr;
58 };
59
